abstract: Grand jury indicts Portsmouth, Va, Police Officer Stephen D Rankin for first-degree murder and felonious use of a gun in April 2015 fatal shooting of William Chapman II in Walmart parking lot.
lead_paragraph: A Portsmouth, Va., police officer who shot and killed a man in a Walmart parking lot was indicted by a grand jury on charges of first-degree murder.

headline.main: Virginia: Murder Indictment for Officer in Shooting Outside Walmart
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Murder Indictment for Officer in Shooting Outside Walmart

snippet: A Portsmouth, Va., police officer who shot and killed a man in a Walmart parking lot was indicted by a grand jury on charges of first-degree murder.

keywords.value: Rankin, Stephen D (Portsmouth, Va, Police Officer)
